publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3116# Richard Lochhead: Use of Fairtrade Products-That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SPCB) for offering Fairtrade tea and coffee to members and staff; looks forward to the steps that the SPCB will take to extend the range of fairly traded products; calls upon local authorities throughout Scotland to promote Fairtrade products in their offices and also within local communities by asking supermarkets and local shops to stock Fairtrade products; congratulates those cities and areas such as Edinburgh, Glasgow, Aberdeen, Dundee, Strathaven and the Isle of Skye for taking this initiative and considers that the Scottish Executive should take the lead and help Scotland become the world's first "Fairtrade country".
S1M-3116# Use of Fairtrade Products (lodged on 15 May 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-3116# Richard Lochhead: Use of Fairtrade Products-That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SPCB) for offering Fairtrade tea and coffee to members and staff; looks forward to the steps that the SPCB will take to extend the range of fairly traded products; calls upon local authorities throughout Scotland to promote Fairtrade products in their offices and also within local communities by asking supermarkets and local shops to stock Fairtrade products; congratulates those cities and areas such as Edinburgh, Glasgow, Aberdeen, Dundee, Strathaven and the Isle of Skye for taking this initiative and considers that the Scottish Executive should take the lead and help Scotland become the world's first "Fairtrade country". Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Mike Rumbles*
S1M-3116# Use of Fairtrade Products (lodged on 15 May 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3116# Use of Fairtrade Products (lodged on 15 May 2002) Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3116# Use of Fairtrade Products (lodged on 15 May 2002) Michael Russell*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3116# Use of Fairtrade Products (lodged on 15 May 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3116# Use of Fairtrade Products (lodged on 15 May 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
